attributes.action: introduce a 97p coin, as more and more items in supermarkets have prices ending in this figure.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For years we've been used to prices ending in 99p, but recently there's been an upsurge of prices ending in 97p, particularly at the UK's most popular supermarket. We need a coin that reflects this trend.
